list.title: Decaf Pike Place® Roast
list.description: A smooth, well-rounded blend of Latin American coffees with subtly rich flavours of chocolate and toasted nuts, it’s served fresh.

list.title: True North Blend
list.description: Lightly roasted coffee that's soft, mellow and flavourful. Easy-drinking and delicious with milk, sugar or flavours like vanilla, caramel or hazelnut.

list.title: Featured Dark Roast
list.description: This full-bodied dark roast coffee has the bold, robust flavours to showcase our roasting and blending artistry.

list.title: Caffè Americano
list.description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of crema culminating in this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance. Pro Tip: For an additional boost, ask your barista to try this with an extra shot.

list.title: Caffè Misto
list.description: A one-to-one combination of fresh-brewed coffee and steamed milk add up to one distinctly delicious coffee drink remarkably mixed.

list.title: Pike Place® Roast
list.description: From our first store in Seattle’s Pike Place Market to our coffeehouses around the world, customers requested a freshly brewed coffee they could enjoy throughout the day.
